``` ::: ::: ## Abstract > If you are a Shiny developer, chances are you've created a dashboard app. > Dashboards are probably the most popular type of Shiny app, and they allow you to display and interact with data in a visually appealing and intuitive way. > > In this talk, we will show you how bslib can make stunning dashboards with Shiny. > Not only is bslib a package that pairs with Shiny to provide up-to-date and themable versions of Bootstrap, but bslib has evolved to include a range of components and layouts that are specifically designed for creating delightful dashboards. > Recently, we've begun recommending Shiny developers turn to bslib instead of shinydashboard, the long time standard dashboarding package for Shiny. > > We will cover all of the latest exciting developments in bslib, including the recently unveiled new default Shiny look and feel.
